pages.text: $(item)Cobbled Stone$() can almost always be found by mining its stone complement with, at minimum, an iron pickaxe.$(p)$(info) $(item)Cobbled Stone$() may also be occasionally found by mining with at a stone, flint, or bone pickaxe.$(p)$(info) $(item)Cobbled Stone$() can also be crafted from $(item)Rocks$().
